subject: Jury System
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jerry Sandusky, the former assistant coach at Penn State accused of sexually abusing 10 boys, regularly brought boys into the locker room showers reserved for coaches, according to two longtime colleagues who testified on Sandusky’s behalf.
snippet: Jerry Sandusky, the former assistant coach at Penn State accused of sexually abusing 10 boys, regularly brought boys into the locker room showers reserved for coaches, according to two longtime colleagues who testified on Sandusky’s behalf.
